self.name: pingDelayDisconnect
self.description: Works like ping. In addition, after this is received, the server starts a timer which will close the current connection disconnectDelay seconds later unless it receives a new message of the same type which automatically resets all previous timers. If the client sends these pings once every 60 seconds, for example, it may set disconnect_delay equal to 75 seconds.
